name: Giancarlo Fisichella
introduction: Giancarlo Fisichella (born January 14th, 1973) is an Italian Formula One driver who has driven for Minardi, Jordan, Benetton, Sauber, Renault, Force India and Ferrari during an 14-year career in the sport.  He is most notable for winning the 2003 Brazilian Grand Prix for Jordan, scoring 77% of the team's points that season in that one race.
